entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 27 February 2023
